title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AND SIGN A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) FOR THE REFERRAL OF CLIENTS IN RELATION TO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE COMMUNITY- BASED DRUG REHABILITATION AND TREATMENT PROGRAM OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS.
